A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was kind of disappointed... It was very exaggerated. Leia wakes up in space\, we still dont know who are Rey's parents\, Luke dies along with Snoke\, Captain phasma\, Admiral Akbar\, we see Maz only once.. its not at all like the old star wars\, they sadly changed all the story.. Unfortunately i liked that they put some humour in it!
